name: Verity, One Of a Kind Miniature Mohair Teddy Bear from Aerlinn Bears
description:
One of a kind hand sewn bear 'Verity' is constructed in a tactile matted mohair with matching wool felt pads.

Fully jointed with glass eyes and a stitched nose.

Standing approx. 4 3/4", 12 cm tall.

Firmly filled in poly fiber.

Wears a pair of knitted rompers in super soft kid mohair/silk blend yarn.

This bear has been made and designed by me Esther Pepper from a non smoking home. It is a collectible and not suitable for a children's toy.

I use Registered Post International. This will give proof of posting with a signed record of delivery.

With in Australia I used Parcel Post and proof of posting with a signed record of delivery. Upon request I will add insurance at your cost.
